text: Karel Fiala (3 August 1925 – 3 October 2020) was a Czech operatic tenor and actor. He was known for his work in operas and musicals, but received worldwide attention for his role of Mozart's Don Giovanni in the movie Amadeus. Fiala was born in Hrušov, Czechoslovakia. Fiala died on 3 October 2020 in Prague from a long-illness, aged 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:European opera singers Category:Czech stage actors Category:Czech movie actors
title: Karel Fiala
